scripts.init: npm i concurrently && concurrently -n CLIENT,SERVER -c blue,green "cd ./client && npm run init" "cd ./server && npm run init"
scripts.start: concurrently -n CLIENT,SERVER -c blue,green "cd ./client && npm start" "cd ./server && npm start"
scripts.start:backend: concurrently -n SERVER,BOT -c red,blue "cd ./server && npm start" "cd ./bot && npm run dev"
scripts.lint:project: concurrently -n Prettier,ESlint,Stylelint -c blue,yellow,green "npm run prettier" "npm run lint:ts" "npm run lint:scss"
